meanings: the 11th and 12th months of the lunar calendar
muster[rally] men of the same mind[kindred spirits]
form a political party with kindred spirits

vlive.korean: 중대장 동지 집에 삽이나 곡괭이 있으시지요? Do you have a shovel or a pickax at home? 듣기 View video OSEN : MONSTA X 몬스타엑스 셔누x주헌, 손예진 변신? 의외의 연기력 #스타로드 09

vlive.korean: 지나가다가 "동지인가?" - 스테이인가? 네? Passing by, find her and think, "Is she one of us"? - Are you STAY? Huh? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 바람 컴백한드아~~~~
vlive.english: Passing by, find her and think, "Is she one of us"? - Are you STAY? Huh?

vlive.korean: 동지들? 친구들. My colleagues? Friends. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 예민한 예성의 봄날의 소나기
동지애도 있고... We felt friendship... 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <아수라> 무비토크 라이브 '< Asura : The City of Madness> Movie Talk Live'

examples.korean: They meet at the club for companionship and advice. 발음듣기 그들은 동지애도 느끼고 조언도 얻으려고 클럽에서 만난다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They meet at the club for companionship and advice. 발음

examples.korean: We became companions in misfortune. 발음듣기 우리는 불행을 겪으며 동지가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We became companions in misfortune. 발음

examples.korean: There was a sense of comradeship between them. 발음듣기 그들 사이에는 동지애[동료애]가 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was a sense of comradeship between them. 발음

examples.korean: You’re among friends here—you can speak freely. 발음듣기 여기 당신은 동지들 사이에 있는 겁니다. 자유로이 말씀하셔도 돼요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’re among friends here—you can speak freely. 발음

examples.korean: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends. (Martin Luther King Jr.) 발음듣기 결국 우리는 적의 말보다 동지의 침묵을 기억할 것이다 (마틴 루터 킹, 침묵명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends. (Martin Luther King Jr.) 발음
